reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Supporting the Kyrgyz Republic with preventive medical supplies to confront the emerging corona virus (Covid-19) within the group of 26 countries

description.narrative: Reducing the spread of the emerging corona virus, supporting the health sector and its resilience in the face of the corona virus, and strengthening health services in combating the spread of Covid-19

Reducing the spread of the emerging corona virus, supporting the health sector and its resilience in the face of the corona virus, and strengthening health services in combating the spread of the corona virus
The health sector continues to provide curative and preventive services to (975,000 beneficiaries) of health sector workers and citizens.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
